title: Souls at Zero - A Taste for the Perverse - Formerly Wrathchild A
description:
Former band members of Wrathchild America. If you\&#039;re into old-school metal - especialyl thrash metal - this album is a MUST HAVE. It took me several years to track down a copy of it, and now I\&#039;m sharing it with you!
